categories: Oh My Smores! Milk Chocolate Bar
description: The amazing taste of s'mores, without burnt fingers, smoke in your eyes, or lost marshmallows.  The bar combines chuao’s super-smooth milk chocolate with vegan marshmallows and honey graham crackers for a decadent version of a campfire favourite to enjoy anywhere.Ingredients: Premium milk chocolate (41% cacao, cacao butter, sugar, dehydrated milk, soy lecithin [as and emulsifier], natural vanilla), vegan marshmallows (corn syrup, beet sugar, corn starch, water, carrageen, soy protein, natural flavour, titanium dioxide), honey graham crackers (corn meal, whole grain wheat, sugar, molasses, sunflower oil and/or canola oil, fructose, modified corn starch, brown sugar syrup, honey, baking soda, calcium carbonate, soy lecithin, dextrose, trisodium phosphate), sea salt.Contains dairy, soy, wheat.
name: Chuao Oh My Smores! Milk Chocolate Bar
